thread.title: Shenzhen Neptunus Bioengineering says 2017 Q3 dividend payment date on Feb. 28

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Shenzhen Neptunus Bioengineering says 2017 Q3 dividend payment date on Feb. 28

organizations.name: reuters) - shenzhen neptunus bioengineering co ltd

text:
Feb 13 (Reuters) - Shenzhen Neptunus Bioengineering Co Ltd
* Says it will pay a cash dividend of 0.7 yuan per 10 shares (before tax) for 2017 Q3 to shareholders of record on Feb. 27
* The companyâ€™s shares will be traded ex-right and ex-dividend on Feb. 28 and the dividend will be paid on Feb. 28
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/SZArPB
